name: RA(F)T
description:
RA(F)T was created for the GMTK game jam 2021 over a period of 48 hours with the theme "Joined Together" in mind.

In the game you are a rat on a ra(f)t and you will try to not fall in to the water and make your raft bigger by joining pieces together. Careful! Because rocks and sharks can break your raft and make you fall in to the water.

Controls: arrows/wasd + space or xbox-controller-joystick + A
